help.refresh_description: Refresh app list and exclude list.
help.select_description: Select or deselect all apps in the current interface.
help.select_denylist_description: Available in Magisk only, select apps that are in the DenyList. Recommended.
help.deselect_unnecessary_description: Unnecessary category: Xposed module, root manager, root-related apps, and general apps that never check bootloader status. This option requires an Internet connection.
help.set_keybox_description: Replace tricky store keybox.xml. AOSP keybox will be replaced if there's no more valid keybox. Valid keybox option requires Internet connection.
help.set_verified_boot_hash_description: Get verifiedBootHash value from Key Attestation Demo. Fix abnormal boot state by resetting ro.boot.vbmeta.digest.

update_banner.redirect_to_release: tap to download the latest version

reset_vbmeta.boot_hash_input_placeholder: Paste your verified Boot Hash here

about.disclaimer: This module is not a part of the Tricky Store module. DO NOT report any issues to Tricky Store if encountered.

prompt.no_valid_fallback: No valid keybox found, replaced with AOSP keybox.
prompt.boot_hash_set_error: Failed to update Verified Boot Hash
prompt.uninstall_prompt: WebUI will be removed after reboot
